body:
Welcome to Ingigo's Store of Phone Backgrounds!
This is a Replacement for 3D Skin Store I did.
I hope to give you the best of service I can offer so yeah! XD
Please, if you want one, follow the format I have given you!

Name:
Background Size (iPhone is 720 by 1280):
Link to 3 pictures:
Position of your Skin: e.g: Forward Facing, 3/4 facing to the right
Do you want the AV Logo in it?:
Unfortunately, due to the lack of time I have, I can only offer 25 backgrounds, So hurry up!!!

People who applied:
AdrianG503 Link: http://i.imgur.com/ASEdI9w.jpg
_Aerodynamic
avumbaca
